attacks.name: Double Slap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Metronome
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pok√©mon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy cost. (You must still do anything else in order to use that attack.) Clefable performs that attack.
